reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy and a great value.
reviews.text:
First things First. I received this as a review item in exchange for an unbiased review. I have an 11 M foot (US) and while I wasn't overly crazy about the color, I realized they matched a lot of my race wear. So I decided to give them a try. The first run was a little tough but that's always the case (If you're new to running, trust me, don't run your first race without adequately breaking in your shoes). After about 15 miles I started to really like them.

So, you see the colors. I personally always buy the clip on laces which I did butI've probably got well over 60 miles on them now and while I'm pretty loyal to another brand (which is also costs substantially more) I will definitely be picking up another pair.

If you are a heel striker (work on your form before you suffer the consequences of it) these have ample cusioning in the back - but take a friendly word of advice, instead of getting into bad form. These are great shoes to improve your form with and once you have it, the extra padding in the back is not impediment. They are very light and fit well once worn in. I'm not trilled about the simultaneously yet cool look they have but so is life. You don't buy running shoes to look cool unless you're a poster you buy them for performance and these deliver.

Again I'm speaking to new runners and people that aren't that familiar with the sport. You don't want to have one pair you wear every day. They'll develop a wear pattern and it's not good. Instead buy at least two, ideally a few and alternate so that this happens at a much slower pace. From my experience, three pairs of shoes worn on alternating days will last much longer than one pair bought three times. And this is important b/c unless you're working on bearfoot running (which seems to still be a raging philosophical battle in the podiatric communities) you'll want support, comfort and stability. As a digression, I've tried barefoot running and it fundamentally changed the way I ran, until I stepped on a piece of glass and my right foot had yet to harden.

Again at the risk of lecturing remember that injuries are one of the biggest enemies to progress. You could easily run through broken glass on these and probably right over some smaller nails (I'm not advising it, just pointing it out). Styling aside I love these and will be picking up another pair or two in the near future.

title: Saucony Women's Switchback 2 Trail Running Shoe
description: Dialed to grip and rip trails fast. For trail runners looking to get to their destination fast, The lightweight Switchback 2 is a race-ready machine that delivers more of what you need—long-distance cushioning placed into a nimble, grippy, and dialed-in package.
features: Synthetic-and-mesh
Rubber sole
Toothy lugs made of PWRTRAC tacky rubber for grip
New pwrrun+ cushioning is 5% lighter for more protection and flexibility
New sock-like construction featuring a side-set boa lacing system

reviews.title: Love the idea, needs some redesign
reviews.text: I really want to like this shoe more. I do actually use them a lot but it took nearly half a year to really break them in, and they’re still fairly difficult to slip into, as the opening is not very flexible. The shoe itself is tight enough where the laces don’t even really need to be there, and the toe box is fairly narrow which isn’t very good for running and hiking. My pinky toe often feels wedged by this one part of the design and frequently causes pain. I really REALLY like the idea of this shoe though and it’s still wearable for moderate hikes under 2 hours, I just wish they put more work and testing. It’s probably better for people with thinner, narrower feet. My feet are medium wide and the top part is kind of high.

reviews.title: Fits just right
reviews.text: I like the way the shoes fit; however, they are more attractive in the picture than on my feet, at least to me.  They are a little pricey too, but all in all, I would recommend them.

【EASY TO USE & REPLACE SPIKES】: The package includes a spike wrench. It is very easy for you to screw the track spikes into the shoes, convenient to replace the spikes. Ideal for athletic tracks, field and cross country surfaces.

title: Brooks Womens Glycerin 18 Running Shoe
description: A bit like running in the clouds. Thanks to the increased elasticity of the upper and the super-soft cushioning throughout the length, these men's running shoes are the ultimate comfort. Super soft cushioning. The revised ratio between midsole and outer sole allows you to increase LOFT DNA to achieve even more extreme softness at the sole of the foot, without losing reactivity or endurance. An OrthoLiteTM insole ensures an extraordinary wearing comfort.
features: Imported
Rubber sole
THIS WOMEN'S SHOE IS FOR: The Glycerin 18 is perfect for runners who think there's no such thing as too much cushioning. The upper enhances comfort by perfectly balancing stretch and structure.

SUPPORT AND CUSHION: Provides neutral support while offering the maximum amount of cushioning. Ideal for road running, cross training, the gym or wherever you might want to take them! Predecessor: Glycerin 17.

SUPER-SOFT CUSHIONING: Increased DNA LOFT super-soft cushioning allows for even more extreme softness, without losing responsiveness or durability, while the OrthoLite sockliner provides premium step-in comfort.
PLUSH FIT: The plush feel of an internal stretch bootie surrounds your foot and moves and expands with your stride. The engineered mesh upper enhances the fit.
SMOOTH TRANSITIONS: The plush transition zone makes every move from heel to toe feel incredibly soft and smooth.

reviews.title: Defective manufacturing
reviews.text: I’m this was my second pair of these shoes within 6 months but this pair is very u comfortable on the left shoe and I can’t do walks in them.  Very disappointed in it... it’s like the left shoe has a defect I it.  Unfortunately I saved the shoe for over a month before I wore it and too late to return.

reviews.title: Great support
reviews.text: These are very comfortable and supportive. I started wearing Brooks when I got planter fasciitis. I haven’t had issues in a long time. I tried another model, but I went back to these.

reviews.title: My Shoe!
reviews.text: These are the only shoes I have been wearing on a daily basis for over 10 years, Brooks Glycerin. My feet have seen many years of 12 hour shifts and are in sad shape. I have a dress pair, a pair I wear indoors, and several pairs for outdoors and yard work.  I can wear a man's 8 1/2 D or a Women's 9 1/2 wide and they fit perfectly.  If you need a cushioned shoe with good support these are the ones to buy.

reviews.title: Don't Buy!!
reviews.text: The shoes are NOT worth 130.00 or 50.00 inserts last less than one month shoes themselves no arch support. In the end caused my feet problems.

title: New Balance Men's 510 V5 Trail Running Shoe
description: Are you looking for a lightweight, durable and supportive pair of trail running shoes? Then your search ends with the New Balance 510v5. Durability on the outside meets responsive comfort inside for a lightweight running shoe that's as ready as you are for a trail run or whatever else your day has in store. Built with a rugged construction, these New Balance trail shoes offer relentless durability that is suitable for various runs both on- and off-road. The lugged outsole on these comfortable running shoes features AT TREAD technology which provides enhanced traction on the trail or the road, while the lightweight injection-molded EVA foam midsole includes both ABZORB technology for impact absorption and an NB Soft + Supportive Insert for memory comfort that lasts. For added protection, the reinforced Toe Protect tip helps protect your toes from rocks, roots and debris so you can go off-road with confidence.
features: 50% Synthetic, 50% Textile
Imported
Rubber sole

Cushioned Running Shoes: ABZORB midsole technology in this runner absorbs impact through a combination of cushioning and compression resistance, and the rubber outsole provides strength and durability
Built-In Off-Road Technology: Toe Protect technology helps protect feet from rocks, roots and debris, while AT Tread on the outsole provides versatile traction during both on- and off-road activities
Plush, Cushioned Running Shoes: These runners feature lightweight injection-molded EVA foam midsoles to provide lightweight cushioning and an NB Soft + Supportive Insert for memory comfort that lasts
Built to Last: With an all-over durable construction and an aggressive lugged outsole, these trail running shoes are designed to stand up to all of your outdoor activities
Athletic Aesthetic: With synthetic and mesh uppers that deliver breathability and a top-quality fit, these running shoes also boast a stylish look to fit in with your active lifestyle

title: ASICS Men's Dynablast Running Shoes
description: The DYNABLAST shoe is recommended for runners who want a responsive underfoot experience during their run. This running shoe comfortably wraps around the foot like a gentle hug. This design features a lightweight and breathable upper to keep feet cool without forgoing support. Additionally, the shoe's upper is made with recycled materials, while the sockliner is produced with a solution dyeing process that reduces carbon emissions and water usage. Equipped with FLYTEFOAM Blast cushioning in the midsole to generate soft landings, this material is also complemented with underfoot cutouts in the outsole to provide runners with a more responsive toe-off.

reviews.title: Dyna and Nova both a Blast.
reviews.text: I had put 700 miles on my Novablast this year and wanted to tell you they held up great even through many runs in snow and rain. I found the Nova well cushioned,nice tongue, wide toe box, firm mid,, but  unstable on camber and turns and a touch heavy.. The dyna I recently purchased feel lighter, good heel cushion, thinner tongue and nice toe drop. I really like both models of ASIC.  Perfect for me at 36 miles a week.

reviews.title: Don't quite fit... 3 is too small & 13 is too big.
reviews.text:
I ordered Size 3 for my daughter who just grew out of 2s. They are tight, heavy and smaller than another 3 we have.

I ordered size 13 for my son who just outgrew size 12. They are very large and larger than other 13s we have.

Both kids said they are too heavy and stiff. They seem like good quality shoes but I can understand the kids' opinion. We are returning both and will try the running shoes with the mesh instead.

reviews.title: Takes A Beating
reviews.text: Purchased these sneakers for our seven year old son. He is very rough on his shoes and I am very surprised how well these sneakers are holding up. He says they are very comfortable and choices to wear them every day.

reviews.text: We like these because they are cute, fit well and are mostly waterproof. They are a little bulky but daughter doesn't seem to mind. So far have held up for most of the year (kids run through their shoes pretty quickly usually).

title: Saucony Men's Redeemer ISO Road Running Shoe
description:
High stability road running shoe, accomidates orthotics & overpronation
Saucony is among the most respected names in running shoes. We offer a wide range of running and walking shoes, each with the Saucony trademark fit, feel and performance. We've spent years studying the biomechanics of top athletes. Our goal? To develop creatively engineered systems that maximize your performance in your specific activity, allowing you to focus on the activity instead of the equipment. From our studies have come many innovative Saucony concepts. Advanced technologies-like Grid, the first sole-based stability and cushioning system--provide an advantage to athletes of all types.
features: 100% Synthetic
Imported
Rubber sole
Width denoters: D (Medium), E, 2E (Wide), 3E (X-Wide),

reviews.title: Stability at a reasonable price
reviews.text: My podiatrist said I needed stability shoes. These were the only ones that fit me properly. So far, they are working well for me. They are slightly wider than expected, but only slightly.

reviews.title: My ankle feel better!

reviews.text: The width is substantially wider than stated. I wear a 2E, which is sometimes too tight, but the 2E in these shoes is far too wide for me, giving the space of a 4E or larger.

title: Saucony Women's Kinvara 13 Running Shoe
description: When it comes to lightweight speed, nothing crushes the competition like the Kinvara. And this just so happens to be our lightest one yet. With more speed contouring and its signature flexible feel, it pushes you forward without holding anything back. These are the shoes you’ll do big things in.
features: Rubber sole
The Kinvara 13 was literally designed for speed. Its beveled midsole and new midfoot contouring deliver a smoother, faster ride.
Its re-imagined upper is made with a single-layer mesh, giving you a lightweight feeling and even more breathability.
We created the lightest Kinvara ever to help you truly take off. It’s 7.2 ounces of pure speed.

reviews.title: Light, neutral shoe
reviews.text: Saucony neutral running shoes are the only kind of running shoes that I have ever purchased. I had accepted that my feet can only tolerate running if I’m wearing the ugliest, clunkiest shoes. That’s changed with this pair. They are so lightweight and look nothing like my other pairs. I usually have to lace up my shoes differently, but haven’t had to do that with these. They’re so lightweight, but provide all of the support that I need

reviews.title: Get 1/2 size larger. I wear 8 1/2 purchased 9.
reviews.text: Comfortable and lightweight. Great color.

reviews.title: Lightweight and breathable
reviews.text:
Pros:
-Overall these shoes are pretty lightweight and breathable. Good amount of air flow with the mesh siding, however you need to take good care of these as the mesh can rip easier when you catch your foot on a step.
-I am a huge fan of saucony and have never had bad results with any of their shoes over the past 20 years. These shoes appear to be more of a basic model that I would expect to last about a year or 1 marathon season.
-No issues with blisters or rubbing.

Cons:
-There isn’t much grip/tread on the bottom of these shoes. For this reason, I don’t expect these to hold up as well as some of the other models of Saucony shoes I’ve had in the past.

reviews.title: Lightweight, cushioned, and Comfortable…
reviews.text:
[[VIDEOID:e8f84c743163d7b17341711cad808847]] These sneakers are true to size and very comfortable. Nice sneakers for light runs or jogging. Very breathable for summer too.

Trust you found this review honest and helpful:-)

reviews.title: True Fit
reviews.text: I have been wearing Saucony shoes for a few years now. They're one of the few shoe brands that I can order without trying on first. I can count on their shoes being true fit. This pair is no exception. I have wide feet and it's hard to find shoes that fit period! Let alone being able to order them online. These are running shoes and I am not a runner. I do find them to be less cushiony than I am used to. Maybe it's because they are running shoes. They are still comfortable to wear. I like the black and silver colors.

features: Rubber sole
Platform measures approximately 1.00"

Easy slip on sneakers: This style of shoelaces is more inclined to decoration, which is suitable for adjusting the tightness of the shoes themselves. Very easy on and off. Medium width. We recommend the wide feet to choose a half size up.

reviews.title: Cut Foot
reviews.text: At first glance these shoes looked ideal. The uppers are mesh and they tie. The black and white look sporty. But the shoes left a,cut on the top of my left foot. The piece that holds the lace is not padded and it rubbed and cut the top of the foot. The right one was okay. Just not acceptable. I suppose yoi could afgix pads to prevent the rubbing or better yet buy shoes without that problem.

reviews.title: Great for walking and running, on even or paved surfaces.
reviews.text:
[[VIDEOID:c1b550fb45bc70f6146cd85777443b05]] The M MGRNDL sneakers are light, a bit flexible, and the air cushion design provides a cushioned impact. They have a good grip on surfaces, so they provide stability.

They do look good and the upper mesh fabric has some breathable properties.

They do a good job when walking and running short distances.
I would have liked if they mold to the foot better and had softer fabric, but at this price point it might be hard to find.

The M MGRNDL might not provide a good experience when running on uneven surfaces. They are not as comfortable as other well known and higher priced (twice as much) running sneakers brands.
The air cushion do provide a bit of support and comfort when running on even ground, such as concrete, pavement, grass or sand.
They do provide some level of impact resistant and support on the feet.

title: Avia Avi Factor Slip On Girls' Sneakers - Lightweight Tennis, Athletic, Running Shoes for Girls - Toddler, Little Kid, and Big Kid Sizes 11 to 6
features: Rubber sole
PERFORMANCE SNEAKERS FOR GIRLS - A sturdy, dependable everyday sneaker that provides ultimate durability for active kids. The lightweight, breathable mesh overlays create comfort and ventilation.

SLIP ON, NO TIE LACES ALTERNATIVE CLOSURE - Gore, bungee, or toggle lace closures with no tying makes an easy, fast on and off option for toddlers, preschoolers, and kids of all ages. The perfect camp, sports, everyday, or back to school shoes! Available in sizes toddler 10 to big kid 6.
COMFORTABLE & DURABLE GIRLS ATHLETIC SHOES - The Avia compression molded EVA midsole and removable EVA sock add supportive cushioning for all-day wear.
COOL TODDLER & GIRLS SNEAKERS - In trendy, versatile colors, these running shoes go with everything in their wardrobes - and they stand out in the crowd!
NON-MARKING TPR SOLEPLATE - Kids will leave their mark on people, not on the ground or gym floor! The thick but light weight rubber sole holds up to everyday wear and play.

reviews.title: Great little athletic shoes
reviews.text: My daughter, age 5, wears a size 13(kid) and has a wide foot. These shoes fit nicely. I like that there isn't any velcro. Velcro never holds up well and everything gets stuck to it. These shoes are closer to the shoes that we'll be buying in the near future once my daughter masters tying laces. Highly recommend these shoes.

reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable but looked worn very quickly
reviews.text: My granddaughter loved these shoes - she loved the colors and the fit -  but they wore out in a matter of a few weeks.

title: WONESION Mens Breathable Walking Tennis Running Shoes Blade Fashion Sneakers
features: Rubber sole
UPPER---Fashion mesh upper, soft and breathable. Super breathable upper keeps your feet clean and cool.
INSOLES---The interior of the shoe uses a honeycomb insole that adds cushioning and impact resistance to provide a comfortable feeling for your feet.
OUTSOLES---Blade soles, made of TPU rubber, durable and enhanced non-slip design and make you walk and sports freely on all kinds of ground.
OCCASIONS---Perfect choice for many occasion: Running, training, gym, casual walking, workout, traveling, hiking, camping, climbing, outdoor activities and daily wear.
Stylish color scheme gives you a different visual experience, slip-on closure type easy put on & off. Simple style, all-match colors, can be match any clothing.

reviews.title: Waited a year of use before my review
reviews.text: To be honest I only bought these shoes from the way they looked (Camo) and only after watching a few viedeos on them.. the price is great.. the comfort is surprising and easy to wear. I weith right at 300 lbs and they support me just fine.. now know I also own Brooks, NB, Adidas, UA HOVR, etc... shoes as well.. are these as comfortable as they are.. No.. but they sure pack a punch bang for the buck thought.. NOW.. One huge issue.;. and again I wanted to wait and see if the soles "scuffed up: for traction.. but no.. If there is rain.. and the water on any surface is thin.. like tile, ocncrete, wood or anything besices most asphalt.. this shoe is like your walking on thin ice.. and YOU WILL SKID! Be warned.. Good.. but Dry use ONLY

reviews.title: Oddly they're a nice shoe
reviews.text: I didn't expect much from these but, they're surprisingly comfortable. They're true to size and the color is pretty neon. The strap around the back is awkward however and I will likely cut it off so it doesn't catch on something when I'm walking. The "just so so" text on the shoe makes no sense... Haha it could easily have been left off... But, again... They're different and bright.

reviews.title: I'd not buy this to wear as a shoe period
reviews.text: Its so heavy & bulky that you can probably use it as a roller shoe but not a shoe per se. I bought this for my daughter as she insisted for it but this is useless and too pricey for the purpose. There are better products available in the market.

reviews.title: Love them
reviews.text: I’ve only taken them for a couple of “rides”, but they seem to work like they should. I put oil on the wheels as directed before first time use. Seemed easier to use the second time as the oil had time to dry. Pretty great and looks good too. I did get the wrong size tho, but somehow still fit

reviews.title: My daughter loves them.
reviews.text: Perhaps my daughter is heavy-footed or something because, when she walks around with these things on, it's so loud. Clank clank clank clank... from the wheels hitting the ground with each step....Reason for the 4 star rating. Other than that, these are great! Seem very sturdy and they operate well. My daughter loves them. She normally wears a size 8.5/9 in women's shoes. The size 42 fits her just fine.

reviews.title: Difficult for me to use
reviews.text: The shoes were cute! They are heavy and clunky, but they definitely looked good! The wheels are far back on the foot, so balancing is hard with the skates out, which put a lot of stress on my calves. For those worried about buying them and paying return shipping if they don't work: Amazon will cover return shipping. The seller sent me a return address and I paid $20 or so to return it to their Cali location. Amazon refunded it to me as a credit that only works on products sold/shipped by amazon (must be both!). I might be weak in the legs, so it could be different for someone else if you want to try it.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes. It's just completely uncomfortable.  There's no support. It feels cheap on. The side stripes are actually tighter than the rest of the shoe so it felt like my foot was being compressed. I have narrow feet and don't have the problem generally so it was very surprising to me. The heel is definitely higher thN the toe. I could feel that I was standing at an angle. I usually love adidas so I was pretty disappointed.

title: ASICS Men's Gel-Cumulus 22 Running Shoes
features: Synthetic-and-mesh
Made in USA or Imported
Rubber sole
3D Print Upper - Increases forefoot support and comfort
Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Technology Cushioning System - Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
FlyteFoam Propel Technology - ASICS energetic foam formulation that provides supreme bounce thanks to a unique elastomer compound.

FlyteFoam Midsole Technology - Our FlyteFoam technology provides exceptional bounce back and responsiveness no matter the distance, utilizing organic super fibers to help reduce packing out that traditionally happens with softer, low density foams.
Guidance Line Midsole Technology - Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.

title: 1/4 Inch Track Spikes, 110pcs Stainless Steel Pyramid Shoe Spikes with Spike Wrench for Track and Cross Country,Replacement Spikes for Sprint Sports Short Running Shoes
features: Improve Running Speed and Safety: Running or sports enthusiast, you must not miss this Track Spikes! This pyramid spikes will add the friction between the shoe sole and ground, thus can resist skid and improve your running speed.

Quality Spikes for Track Shoes : Made of quality stainless steel, which is very sturdy, rust-resist and anti-corrode. Pyramid needle design, not damage track. Providing long servicing life.These spikes are suitable for all athletic tracks, and field or cross country surfaces,help you get better grades.

Small Spikes Size : Perfect size 1/4"extra track spikes, full length is 0.5”(12.8mm), pyramid needle design, spike wrench size 2"*1.8". Easy to match with most of the track shoes, bring you superior traction, strength and durability
Widely Usage : The spikes provide optimal grip for track and field or dry terrain in cross-country, ideal for track sprints, long jump, running, outdoor sports activities

Enough Quantity Spikes : Package include 110 pieces pyramid track spikes with 1 pieces spike wrench and 1 pieces transparent storage box, easy to carry and convenient for you to replace your shoe spikes. There are enough quantity for your daily use.

title: New Balance Kids' 680 V6 Hook and Loop Running Shoe
description: The New Balance 680 v6 kids' running shoe is a sneaker that blends style and performance to satisfy both kids and adults alike. A modern design ups your little one's cool factor, featuring a no-sew construction for a sleek fit and feel that's snug and secure without being too tight, delivering both a comfortable fit and contemporary style. The streamlined silhouette on these running shoes for kids includes leather and mesh upper material with a stitched-down tip and foxing details for flexible support and lasting durability. These kids' performance shoes also include an ABZORB midsole that absorbs impact through a combination of cushioning and compression resistance, for a cushioned ride that takes kiddos from the classroom to the playground and everywhere in between. These comfortable kids' running shoes are available in a variety of colors that range from neutral to bold and bright, so your child can pick the one that suits their style and boosts their confidence.
features: Rubber sole
Power in Simplicity: The New Balance 680v6 running shoe for kids features a minimal leather and open mesh upper, offering flexible support and easy-breezy comfort
Modern Construction for an Outstanding Fit: The leather/mesh upper on these New Balance kids' running shoes features a stitched-down tip and foxing details to provide flexible support and durability
Soft Underfoot Cushioning: The ABZORB midsole absorbs impact through a combination of cushioning and compression resistance, giving these kids' running shoes a comfortable feel that lasts all day
Designed for Support and Durability: These kids' performance shoes feature a strong rubber outsole to offer long-lasting durability, built to stand up to daily use and playground wear-and-tear
Available in a Range of Colors: From neutral tones to bold hues, these cushioned running shoes for kids are available in a range of shades to suit the style and color preferences of your little one

reviews.title: Great for wide feet!
reviews.text: My son has bilateral clubbed feet, and he no longer wears braces but has a wide foot. New balance is the only brand that works for him. This particular model is perfect for him!

reviews.title: The best for extra wide feet
reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for my special needs child. He has extra wide feet and he has trouble with shoe tying.

reviews.title: Reviews are right about the quality
reviews.text: Wish I read the reviews more carefully. I’m so desperate to find shoes that fits my boys’ wide feet that I just assumed NB would be good because I’ve gotten them in the past. But no the quality is sub par. They are already falling apart and it’s only been 1.5 months. I’ll probably have to buy them new shoes soon which is a shame because it’s not like these are some off brand cheapies. You expect more from a company like NB.

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.text: These New Balance shoes are great. The insoles are so comfortable and I know that my little one is getting the protection that she needs for her growing feet. The shoes fit true to size, and they width is great. She has a normal foot, I wouldn't recommend them for a child with wide feet. They are comfortable to wear and look great. This particular style is great for young children due to the velcro. Most kids by the time they get to this style shoe CAN tie their own shoes, but its so much easier and quicker for them just to  be able to do the velcro and go!We love them.

reviews.title: Maybe I just got a defective pair of shoes...
reviews.text: The insoles don’t fit the shoes, nor were they glued in. So they kept sliding out. Nice looking shoe from a distance but they are falling apart.
